survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from individuals who have recently adopted a pet to assess their satisfaction with the adoption process and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall pet adoption process?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity and ease of analysis.
